title: Q4 - Do all breaches need to be reported to affected individuals, or only severe ones?
description: Under the Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023 (DPDPA), all data breaches must be reported both to the Data Protection Board of India and to the affected Data Principals (individuals) — there is no distinction in the law between “minor” and “severe” breaches.
